Articles.Content:
Primary: Launch Starship to the orbit

Stretch: Launch Starship to the orbit and successfully land Superheavy and Starship near KSC

Jeb Level: Land Superheavy without RUD, make flyby around the Mun by Starship and return to KSC as one part

Val Level: Transport as many kerbals as you can by Starship to Duna! Take them out of the landed vehicle and take a picture together with the Starship. And don't forget about Superheavy!

What challenge for this week, ha?

(Okay, this challenge logicaly and obviously will be the most probable)
